info.name: StumbleUpon - Ultra-Compact Toolbar
info.description: Hide the overflow menu, unnecessary dropmarkers, "First Rater" icon (when present), and a couple of separators to make the StumbleUpon toolbar more compact. (When you've already turned off most of the icons, the overflow menu, combined with SU's resizing semantics, is really just a waste of space)
info.additionalInfo:
2011-03-02: Updated to follow the storm of element ID renames in SU toolbar v3.81.

2011-04-09: Adjust Dislike button to look right in Firefox 4 now that 4.0.1 won't freeze on me.
